overview: The most popular teen superheroes on Earth are now the coolest space travelers in the universe, and this time they've met their match - literally! The sinister Psycho Rangers know the Power Rangers inside and out, making them all the more difficult to identify and defeat. It's all part of Dark Specter's scheme to steal Zordon's power and spread evil throughout the galaxies, but the real Power Rangers have other plans in mind, and not even the wickedly beautiful Astronema can destroy them...or can she?  Go galactic as Power Rangers in Space takes you on a power-packed journey through the cosmos that'll keep you on the edge of your Megazord. It's a blast!
title: Power Rangers In Space
